Methods in edu.macalester.turtle with parameters of type TurtleObserver
 void Turtle.addObserver(TurtleObserver observer)
          Adds an observer to be notified of this turtle's motions (typically for the purpose of drawing them to paper).
 void Turtle.removeObserver(TurtleObserver observer)
          Removes the given observer.
